mapper.sql: id, user_id, day, day_time, counts, dept_id
mapper.delete: delete from work_setting where user_id=#{userId} and month(day)=#{month}
mapper.select: select day,day_time as dayTime,counts as title from work_setting w where w.user_id=#{userId} and month(day)=#{month} and year(day) =#{year}
select * from work_setting where user_id=#{userId} and day=#{day}

select t2.n-t.m as num from (select count(*) as m from order_info s where s.user_id=#{userId} and s.`day` like '%${day}%' and s.day_time=#{dayTime}) t, (select counts as n from work_setting w where w.user_id=#{userId} and w.`day`=#{day} and w.day_time=#{dayTime}) t2
